DOC.brief_title: Glaucoma Treatment Cyclo-coagulation Using High Intensity Focused Ultrasound ( HIFU )
DOC.criteria: Refractory Glaucoma IOP > 21 mm Hg No previous intraocular surgery laser treatment 90 day HIFU day Age > 18 year Informed consent sgned subject Normal Tension Glaucoma Glaucoma drainage device implant still present eye treat History ocular retrobulbar tumor Ocular infection within 14 day prior HIFU procedure Aphakic patient Ocular disease glaucoma may affect assessment visual and/or IOP ( choroidal hemorrhage detachment , lens subluxation , thyroid ophthalmopathy , proliferative diabetic retinopathy , clinical significant macular edema ) Pregnant breastfeed woman , lack contraception use among woman likely child
